description: make.bat: don't show error message if old generated files do not exist

messages.text:
On Fri, Mar 16, 2012 at 4:20 PM, <mattn.jp@gmail.com> wrote:

> On 2012/03/16 08:03:33, brainman wrot
> Also this part?
>
> del "%GOTOOLDIR%\go_bootstrap.exe"
>
We expect go_bootstrap.exe to exist at this point, if it does not, then it
is
a bug, and the error should be visible.
(Of course, if go_bootstrap.exe doesn't exist at this point, the build will
fail
earlier.)

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=0b67257c702f ***

make.bat: don't show error message if old generated files do not exist

R=golang-dev, alex.brainman, mattn.jp
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5843045

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

On Fri, Mar 16, 2012 at 6:35 PM, mattn <mattn.jp@gmail.com> wrote:

>
> On Friday, March 16, 2012 6:02:06 PM UTC+9, minux wrote:
>>
>>
>> On Fri, Mar 16, 2012 at 4:20 PM, <mattn.jp@gmail.com> wrote:
>>
>>> On 2012/03/16 08:03:33, brainman wrot
>>> Also this part?
>>>
>>> del "%GOTOOLDIR%\go_bootstrap.exe"
>>>
>> We expect go_bootstrap.exe to exist at this point, if it does not, then
>> it is
>> a bug, and the error should be visible.
>> (Of course, if go_bootstrap.exe doesn't exist at this point, the build
>> will fail
>> earlier.)
>>
>
> When build get fail, go_bootstrap.exe will not be there. And it's make
> error in next build time. It's not useful error, I guess.
>
And line 67 would have already brought us to the fail label.

On 2012/03/16 08:03:33, brainman wrote:
> LGTM
> 
> Alex

Also this part?

del "%GOTOOLDIR%\go_bootstrap.exe"

On Friday, March 16, 2012 6:02:06 PM UTC+9, minux wrote:
>
>
> On Fri, Mar 16, 2012 at 4:20 PM, <mattn.jp@gmail.com> wrote:
>
>> On 2012/03/16 08:03:33, brainman wrot
>> Also this part?
>>
>> del "%GOTOOLDIR%\go_bootstrap.exe"
>>
> We expect go_bootstrap.exe to exist at this point, if it does not, then it 
> is
> a bug, and the error should be visible.
> (Of course, if go_bootstrap.exe doesn't exist at this point, the build 
> will fail
> earlier.)
>

When build get fail, go_bootstrap.exe will not be there. And it's make 
error in next build time. It's not useful error, I guess.

subject: code review 5843045: make.bat: don't show error message if old generated fil...
